titleStmt.title: Sir, in obedience to your commands, I here send you a short account of Dr. Hick's Book, now in the press at Oxford; the title of it is, Linguarum veterum septentrionalium thesaurus grammatico-criticus & archæologicus. Acedit de linguarum veterum septentrionalium usu dissertatio : et catalogues librorum veterum septentrionalium, tam eorum qui excusi sunt, quam qui in membranis scripti nondum eduntur, quam fieri licuit, locupletissimus.
titleStmt.author: Brome, William.

titleStmt.title: Sir, in obedience to your commands, I here send you a short account of Dr. Hick's Book, now in the press at Oxford; the title of it is, Linguarum veterum septentrionalium thesaurus grammatico-criticus & archæologicus. Acedit de linguarum veterum septentrionalium usu dissertatio : et catalogues librorum veterum septentrionalium, tam eorum qui excusi sunt, quam qui in membranis scripti nondum eduntur, quam fieri licuit, locupletissimus.
titleStmt.author: Brome, William.
Hickes, George, 1642-1715. Linguarum veterum septentrionalium thesaurus.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Brome. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
